alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 9:08PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Newton, northern Johnson and southwestern Boone Counties through 945 PM CST... At 908 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Witter to Boston to near Pettigrew to 7 miles east of Cass. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper... Erbie... Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area... Red Bank... Devils Knob... Lost Valley State Park... Walnut... Rosetta... Capps... Batavia... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Marble Falls... Catalpa... Yale... Crossroad... Fallsville... Swain... Gum Springs in Newton County... Gaither... Oark... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
